content: knitted potholder with multi-colored pattern in drops safran drops design pattern no e-259 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- measurements approx 20 x 20 cm / 8 x 8 materials drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g color 05 light blue purple 50 g color 31 lime 50 g color 55 cerise 50 g color 18 off white 50 g color 16 black drops circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 3 mm/us 2 5 or the size needed to get 24 stitches and 32 row stockinette stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height
